pages.text: Etching Acid is used to chemically develop $(l:components/pcb)PCB's/$. Etching Acid is made in a $(l:manufacturing/pressure_chamber)Pressure Chamber/$ and used in the $(l:manufacturing/etching_tank)Etching Tank/$.$(p)See the $(l:components/pcb)PCB's/$ entry for more info on PCB production.
